item.title: About
item.description: Hello World I’m Brian, and this is my personal blog. Simply put, I am a husband, father, and geek. I live, work, and play in Nashville, Tennessee as a Founder at Gadgetry and as the VP of Platform Engineering at Augeo. As a Founder at Gadgetry I am focused on sharing practitioner level knowledge and expertise implementing Platform as Code and advanced DevOps capabilities using Open Source Technology, Cloud Based Services, and Industry Best Practices.
